local_intent: Execute a single push stroke along 180 degrees on the cloth edge after confirming visibility and alignment; confirm grasp stability afterward.
assumptions: Cloth edge is lightly grasped from prior steps
Robot is already near the cloth edge and above the table
coherence_with_global: Matches the Push phase in GLOBAL_BT (distance 0.1, direction 180, timeout 1200). Adds minimal precheck (visibility), approach/align before the push, and post-check (grasp stability) consistent with the transfer phase of folding.
